website_summaries.verdict: With a loyal following, this cream has transformed a number of feet, resulting in a very faithful fan base.
pros: We love how absorbent this cream is and how it doesn't leave a trail of grease when you walk around barefoot
Customers with severely cracked feet swear by this product in terms of its healing ability
cons: Takes some getting used to in terms of how this product will feel on your feet

customer_reviews.title: Changed ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Changed ingredients and the new product does not come close to the original! Such a shame because this used to be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Great cream! Last week they were so cracked it hurt to walk on them! Now look at them!
customer_reviews.author: amberthang

customer_reviews.title: Meh nothing to rave about
customer_reviews.text: Used it nightly and have yet to see any improvement. Have used it for about 45 days.
customer_reviews.author: Maria k

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a thick cream. This is nothing special. Might as well be a generic lotion. The marketing and advertising campaign prompted my purchase. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Slippery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cream on brand recognition, but find it's thick, slippery, and greasy. It doesn't soak in well and isn't particularly moisturizing even for my only modestly-dry skin. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Works miracles but made sole of foot red
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a miracle product for heels, but I was also wiping excess on the sole of my foot (more delicate skin in middle of foot) & then putting socks over it at night. After a few days I woke up with itchy soles. When I looked, everywhere the cream had been was bright red! I haven’t found much online about people having reactions to this product, but I sure did. Now I’m careful to just put it on my heels, but my feet still are a tad itchy/tender ever since. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: GlitterallyScoot

customer_reviews.title: Possible knock-off of the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a knock-off of the real O'Keeffe's Healthy Feet. Is not effective and does not get the results I've gotten in the past with O'Keeffe's.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product and I thought I would because of the reviews but unfortunately, I don't. It gives my feet a rubbery feel that I don't like and it doesn't make my feet any smoother or moisurized.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Reich

customer_reviews.title: Horrible foot pain after using this product
customer_reviews.text: Only good thing about this product is I only wasted $7. I put this cream on before bed and woke up to horrible tingling and zapping nerve pain on the bottoms of my feet. I’m in my 30s and have never had foot pain before. My feet are also not very dry nor cracked. I tried to return it but is ineligible. People, please be careful with this.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not a moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: If you are expecting this cream to make your feet soft because it puts moisture in, then it's not for you. If you use it after soaking your feet, it will lock in the moisture but it doesn't add any. It's kind of a weird texture too. It feels almost like silicone, which maybe it is. It definitely heals cracked feet if you use it right and will keep them from cracking if used daily. It does sting a bit if your cracks are deep, but that does away after a few minutes. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Perry

customer_reviews.title: I have had dry, cracking feet my entire life.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when ordering this product but love the stuff. I have had a problem with dry cracking feet my entire life but this really worked. I would apply this a night. It isn't greasy and absorbs right in after just a minute or two. I actually use sand paper blocks to sand my callouses down and then apply the cream. I don't need to wear a pair of socks overnight to keep the stuff on my feet since it absorbs right in skin. For the first time the cracks have closed up and I can walk pain free. I am going to keep a spare container of this with me all the time from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The first photo is my heel before using the product and the second one is now. It's not all the way healed but the damage was bad. I have been trying different things for like 2 months and then I found this stuff. My trick is to take a pantyliner and put some O'Keefe's on it and put that part directly on it and put a sock on so it holds the moisture all day and night. I do change it at least 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal P

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a soap-scum look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. I've been using another brand foot cream that works great but I just read about pathogens so decided to make a switch from what I was using. Cons: Didn't moisturize my feet Doesn't blend in well, it leaves a white chalky film on your foot making your feet appear more dry. Like a soap-scum appearance One of the heels of my foot became more tender to walk on after using this for a few days, it wasn't being moisturized enough I guess so I switched back to what I was using
customer_reviews.author: Smart Saver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife, for the last 42 years has had the most massaged feet in America, and probably Europe. She lays down on the couch, I massage her feet, she goes to sleep; I turn the channel to ESPN. I have not found a better foot massage cream, I especially like that it smoothes the feet well enough, almost as well as a pumice, unlike other creams that are said to br for rough skin; this cream does not have that gritty feel that needs to washed off. Excellent product, good sleep for her, lots of sports babble for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves white, chalky crap all over your feet and burns!!! It didn't hydrate them at all, just left a weird waxy film that was hard to wash off of my hands afterward. I was really grossed out by this and couldn't bring myself to finish the tub. There isn't much in there, either. Get anything else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cx

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work but will give a second chance
customer_reviews.text: I believe I got a defective product as upon opening it didn’t have the smooth consistency as other pictures online have depicted. I wish I knew much sooner as I’m already half way through using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product literally changed the texture of my feet overnight. I put the Healthy Feet on, put on socks and went to sleep. Today I have soft feet that look healthy! I am now a permanent customer of O'Keefe's. It doesnt take much to cover your foot. The texture is smooth and non-greasy. It is also completely odorless which amazed me. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: KJTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: best foot cream ever
customer_reviews.text: this is seriously the best foot cream ever. I bought it because I liked the OKeefe's Healthy Hands so much, and this had good reviews. But I didn't expect to love it so much. I feel like a commercial, but I started using it a few days before a trip to Mexico (read: barefoot and sandals 24-7). Even walking around in the sand for a few days, usually that makes my feet nasty and dry. But my feet felt moisturized for days. I've been back from my trip for over a week, and my feet still feel soft. This is 100x better than any other foot cream, ped egg, rolling vibrating foot file thingy, and pedicure combined.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for super dry feet!
customer_reviews.text: My feet have always been super dry, cracked, and leather-like. I hate shoes, and going barefoot all the time is hard on skin. This product has greatly reduced the cracks and dryness on the bottoms of my feet. It is a heavy creme, and does feel heavy going on, but that's because it's working! I use a ped-egg to exfoliate, then put this creme on and put socks on my feet before bed. This removes dead skin, and the lotion can really work, the socks keep feet covered and let the lotion really sink in. Do this every night for a few days and you WILL see a huge difference. Love this product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I had really bad and painful cracks on the bottom of my feet which I tried to take care of in different ways but they'd come back in no time and feel worse than before. The cracks were closed in just one time use! I could not believe it myself. It's such a relief to go by your day and not feel the pain with every step you take. Would definitely recommend this product. I'm still using other methods on top of using O'Keeffe's foot cream to achieve soft skin on the bottom of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona B.

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every cream i could find, from the most expensive to the cheapest. This one was recommended by my foot doctor when I asked for a cream prescription for my cracked heels. He recommended this over the counter, and not too expensive for the amount needed cream. I got it and was completely shocked when after about the 3rd night in using it I saw a difference and by the 5th night my very cracked (to the point of bleeding) heels were once gain beautiful and smooth. The cream actually works. The description says to use it sparingly and not put too much on. I followed that and got the great results.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Winter

customer_reviews.title: Good basic foot lotion
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is strong and sealing. It is kind of like putting wax on your feet. It works best after you've showered and maybe used pumice on your feet. My feet are soft after doing that. However, I was hoping that this lotion would also encourage exfoliation. I've since learned that this lotion doesn't do that. Also, while it does absorb well, the lotion leaves a bit of a tacky sensation on the skin, which isn't terrible but isn't great, either. Overall, it's fine and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: violetcherry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, amazing, amazing! Did I say amazing?
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend's elbows. He's a CAD Designer so he spends all day working on his computer, and his elbows showed it. He got pedicures, used creams and lotions; none of these really helped. I even got out my Dremel... Then I saw this mentioned in a magazine "The stars swear by this foot cream!" Well, if it's good enough the stars... I read the reviews here and saw the photos of the feets, and ordered it. Amazing results! And in less than a week! Wow! Now his elbows are quite lovely. :) My feet are in pretty good shape but I'm buying some anyway. Along with the other products. :)
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This container arrived FILTHY and damaged. I have no idea how old this is, or where it's been. I tried to return it, but it's a personal product, so returns are not allowed. Total fail, very annoyed
customer_reviews.author: MissMel

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, and loved it. It had always worked so well. However, my last order is not very good. I noticed they slightly changed the packaging to a lighter blue color. They must have also changed the formula. It now takes weeks to accomplish what used to be done in a couple of days. With constant daily use over several weeks, my feet are becoming soft. This used to happen in a couple of days. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: g8idea

customer_reviews.title: My feet love this
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what took me so long to write a review on this. This is my second jar and I'm about to order more. This has keep my feet so soft and moisturized, better than anything else I've used in the past. I was very surprised that it's not greasy and was skeptical it would work because of this....boy, was I in for a shock. I massage it into my feet after a shower at night, sometimes I wear socks, sometimes not, but each morning, my feet feel so soft and smooth! If you have never tried this, give it a shot, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: It works for cracked heels
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually leave reviews but this stuff works, been struggling with dry cracked split heels for years.. biweekly pedicures, tons of lotion and moisturizing nothing works. It was really cheap and read the raving reviews and just tried it but didn’t expect anything to really happen. This stuff is amazing and a little goes a long ways been using only 5 days and you can see dramatic change I will continue this the rest of my life. Finally walking on my heels with no pain! I just bought their hand cream and excited to use since my hand have the same dry problems.. before I started and 5 days into using. Will update another phot after a months use
customer_reviews.author: Nani huynh

customer_reviews.title: Best ever heel cream for your cracked heels !!!! GET IT
customer_reviews.text: OMG ! After having a very difficult pregnancy and overweight my heels cracked terribly so I was desperate and gave a try to this cream. I never say it but it did wonders. Magically and instantly I could already see the improvements of my cracked heels next day. In a week and a half my heels were back to normal. But you have to follow the instructions and be consistent to see the result ! I still periodically apply it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: This works even better than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: You don't find products that actually deliver more than they promise, but this foot cream does just that. I've already purchased more. The directions suggest using only a small amount and I find that to be true. There is no scent which is really nice. It's very moisturizing. My heels were very cracked and were actually causing me some pain. Within a couple of weeks of using my Amope Pedi Perfect and following up with the O'Keeffe's for Healthy Feet Foot Cream you would never know my feet were ever cracked. O'Keeffe's is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Pasty consistency that turns smooth, great for more than just feet!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! The consistency is like the paste that you used to eat in kindergarten (looks like it too), but it turns smooth and creamy when you put it on your skin. It WORKS! I have problems with dry skin, including cracking in my heels. This cream turned my skin around in the winter months, and I’m sure it’s going to be great all summer long. I’ve also been using it on my knees and on the backs of my arms for keratosis pilaris, and I’ve seen a real difference! This cream has no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey M

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I get hard callouses on my feet from poor body alignment. I'm pre-diabetic, so I need to keep my feet as healthy as possible. O'Keefe's is the only product I have found that really works consistently to soften callouses, and keep them from getting hard. When used nightly, I find less callousing. First responders, who are always on their feet, would benefit from this foot cream, or O'Keefe's hand cream. I have donated jars of the hand cream to front line medical staff, and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: It's too oily!
customer_reviews.text: I read many good review about this product, but I really hated this cream! I tried to like it, but it didn't work at all. My feet are not better. My skin doesn't absorb this. I use before going to bed, next day I can still feel my feet sticky. I don't recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela S.

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY works, cracks are gone
customer_reviews.text: This cream really works. I had lot cracks on my heels, and in about 10 days of continuous use, they were gone. I've tried other creams (namely  and , and none worked as well as this one - none actually got rid of the cracks. This cream has no scent whatsoever, and it has a very sticky feel to it, but my goal was skin healing, and it really works on thath.
customer_reviews.author: purchaser

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PRODUCT I'VE EVER HAD!!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews before buying this product. The conststency is like THICK whipped moisturizing cream. It last a LONG TIME but I only use just as much as needed. I put a tiny bit on my calluses and my heels every day shower or not because I use a Q tip in the product & not my fingers so my feet don't "have to" be perfectly clean. It sofens my feet enough to use "rasp", "pumace" or whatever you use to get rid of calluses or dry cracked heels. I do keep socks on *if* I'm home *BUT* it's worth it. HOPE THIS HELPS
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Really uncomfortable waxy residue
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product and felt certain I would given the overwhelmingly positive reviews. But, I don’t like it at all. I tried sticking it out and using the whole jar, but I can’t handle the weird filmy feeling in my feet and hands after applying. I would put socks on immediately after applying to let the lotion sink in, but hours later when I went to bed, my feet felt gross and that weird waxiness even transferred to my bed sheets wherever my feet touched them. Just not worth the ick factor!
customer_reviews.author: MidAtlantic A

customer_reviews.title: What a Difference a Month Makes!
customer_reviews.text: Oh what a difference a month makes, with a pumice stone and O'Keeffe's (recommended by my sister)! I tried so many moisturizers, creams, oils, scrubs, to no avail. The combo of pumice (about twice a week) and O'Keeffe's (daily at night) finally healed my feet! I love how the cream is not oily, it is the perfect consistency. The pumice stone is here: "PIXNOR Pumice Stone Foot Scrubber Callus Remover Pack of 2"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This TRULY WORKS...
customer_reviews.text: This TRULY WORKS. I had extreme "Dry/Cracked/Peeling Off" heels and this did the trick. I started applying this right before sleep for few days and I saw the difference. I washed my feet with water and applied this generously on my heels before getting on the bed. After just few days my heels improved with the "Dryness Minimizing/Cracks Healing/Skin Peeling Off Stopping". I'm super pleased I bought this heel cream. Followy steps and you will SEE THE DIFFERENCE.
customer_reviews.author: Indy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product ages ago and misplaced it so bought a new one, then found my original one. I get incredibly dry feet and heels during the winter. This product is amazing. My heels that are normally cracked and peeling and almost to the point of bleeding are almost completely healed over and look brand new. You don’t need a ton of product and it has zero fragrance. This stuff is amazing and I would highly recommend it. I don’t give very many products the title of holy grail but this one deserves it from me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: not for severely cracked feet, not for people with heel fissures
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for severely cracked feet with fissures that are painful. Made the heels temporarily a little softer for a day, but that's it. Plain Vaseline would have been cheaper. If you are truly suffering with fissures in your heels, don't bother with this. Instead, go for a cream with urea in it, but put bandages on the fissures with Vaseline or Neosporin to help the fissures heal before using the urea cream.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as great as I had hoped it would. My feet were pretty bad-just about as bad as some in the pictures that were posted. Although it did help with the top layer of the dry skin (thats why i gave it 3 stars), it didn't quite do the job of removing any hard calluses on the feet which is what I was hoping for. I have used the product now for one month-I started off using it morning and night and now I apply mostly at night. Will have to look for something else for the hard calluses!
customer_reviews.author: AP81

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 1 1/2 weeks for my dry heels and see a big difference. I've tried many different creams, lotions and potions and never saw results. I do get regular pedicures but still, the roughness was getting worse with deep crevices that I knew would lead to cracking. The tube seems to be different; I bought it locally when I couldn't find the tub. I saw no difference with the tube contents but the tub definitely works. My feet will be sandal ready in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R

customer_reviews.title: My mom considers this a "must-have" for anyone with feet issues.
customer_reviews.text: My mom absolutely loves this stuff. I purchased it for her, knowing that she spends a lot of time on her feet. Growing up in Upstate New York, she was constantly running around barefoot. Now that she lives in the heat of Arizona, she has mentioned how painful her feet are, and how damaged they've become over the years. I sent her this, and she said that she's seen dramatic changes in her feet. She said that they have healed beyond her expectations, and that her feet no longer hurt her the way they used to. She absolutely recommends it, and I will be buying her more soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works maybe to well
customer_reviews.text: After I gave myself a pedicure I started using this product. The next morning my heel on my left foot hurt so bad. I used the cream the next few nights and it still really hurt. I stopped using it daily and my heel felt better. I think this product works TOO well in terms of moisturizing which is my my heel hurt. When I started using it every other day it worked well and I had no issues. I initially thought I overdid my pedicure but when I went and got a professional pedicure and used this product daily and had the same issue. I Love the product I just can't use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Results in one application
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing ! I used a heel scrub first then applied this overnight and the results were outstanding ! I will be honest it's thick and I don't like the heavy feeling since it's pastey. But I just put it on my heels and toes so I can deal with it in order to get the smoothe heels ! I suffer from cracked dry heels for about 8 years and this stuff has been a huge help. I have been using the regular stuff on my kids eczema and it is amazing as well . 40 percent improvement overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Right Away!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just in the one day I’ve used it I’ve seen and felt results. It’s odorless which is a big plus. A little goes a long way for sure. It kinda tingles a little bit but not really a sting. Even my hands were tingling where the cream got in my cracked hands. Just applied it to my heels and put on some heel socks then let it do the rest. Will order again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Willis

customer_reviews.title: WORKS MIRACLES
customer_reviews.text: I recently started to get these deep cracks in my heels which was a new experience for me. I tried using a pumice to remove any callouses, used heel balms, and coconut oils. None of it worked. I ordered this lotion based on the reviews and after 4 days of using this every morning and night, my cracks were 99.9% gone. I've continued to use every evening and the cracks have stayed away. This stuff works miracles and I cannot recommend it enough!
customer_reviews.author: swimgirl

customer_reviews.title: O'Keeffe's Healthy Feet Foot Cream
customer_reviews.text: Using this faithfully for one month every day, I was not impressed. After over a month I still have cracks in the heels of my feet. I do not believe this cream can repair cracked feet without another intervention. That is to say, one must file down the cracks and then apply this cream. That helps somewhat. However, the cream cannot repair severely cracked feet by itself. I found that out with diligent effort made. So if looking for a panacea to cracked feet, this is not it. I shall not be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I like to go barefoot in summer, which means my feet bottoms are basically one big callous. Not the most attractive of my features. I've purchased high-priced creams that smell great and leave my feet soft ... until the morning. This is the ONLY foot cream that's actually made a difference. A little dab will do ya, and it even says so on the container. No smell. Put a little on each day, throw on your socks, and give it a week. You will be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: No more cracked dry heels!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me with dry cracked feet and feel embarrassed when getting a pedicure, this stuff is for you! I had my doubts as I've tried a few moisturizers and nothing really seemed to work. I did combine this lotion with using a pumice stone prior to moisturizing. My heels are smooth now and I use this stuff maybe 3 times a week. It does leave a greasy feeling on your hands afterwards, but dries pretty quickly on your feet. No real scent, just moisturizer. I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: gimmemygoods

customer_reviews.title: WOW O' WOW ~ IT REALLY WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a MIRACLE to my very dry feet! I lathered it on & put on cotton ankle socks overnight and a week later my feet are still doing great. The BONUS was the hand I used to apply this product to my feet worked MAGIC on my cuticles!! This is an amazing product & when I saw it for sale while I was waiting to check out at a local store, I told the lady behind me how wonderful this product IS!!!! This is the ONE product that "Comes Through" with their claims and even more than you could ever imagine ~ ~ ~ I'd give it TEN STARS if I could!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have some pretty gnarly feet. I love going barefoot... year round, in a state that has 4 seasons. I'll spare you too many details (and definitely no pictures) and just say this stuff works EXTREMELY well. Even on my crusty elbows, which rival with my feet in the "most flakey body part" competition. Update: I use this stuff weekly and still have well over half a jar left. A little goes a very long way! My crusty elbows are just normal elbows now (!!!) and my feet are more "yup, doesn't wear shoes a lot" and less "bridge troll had a love child with Shrek". I love this cream, and recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but residue remains for long time
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry feet so I was looking for a lotion that I could apply overnight to easy my dry skin. I was excited to try this lotion in hopes that it would relieve my dryness. There are a few things I like about this product. Specifically, the lotion is very thick and the texture isn't runny. There isn't really a scent, which is fine. Due to the thickness, its not easy to spread. The issue I have is that it takes forever to dry. I will apply it before bed and find that even after a full nights sleep it's still on feet. Sometimes I even have to wipe it off.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Solved my dry, cracked heel issue
customer_reviews.text: Fixed my dry, cracked heel issue that I've had for years. I have to put this on at least 5 days a week or my heel will go back to being dry and cracked quite quickly. This is the only solution I've found. Dermatologists gave me several prescription lotions and none of those worked. This did. Note: I tried this same brand in the squeezable bottle and it didn't work. I'm assuming it's a slightly different formulation because it's a lotion rather than a solid like what comes in the circular container.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Mckean

customer_reviews.title: It works. It really, really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats O'Keeffe's Healthy Feet. The cracks on my heels disappear overnight when I first use this, followed by the O'Keeffe's, then a pair of super-sexy, cotton socks to bed. It's the only solution I've ever found to getting rid of cracked and gross heels on an otherwise beautifully pedicured foot. Forget paying extra at the nail salon to remove callouses - you won't need to anymore after you launch this 3-pronged attack on your feet. You'll LOVE it. I received nothing in return for writing this review. I'm just tired of looking at other people's ugly feet.
customer_reviews.author: LA Rider

customer_reviews.title: Really works and little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works pretty good, you can tell it's working when your feet are really dry it tingles a little. I had really calloused dry feet and now no cracks and calluses are getting better everyday. It's kind of the consistency of coconut oil, and spreads easily like coconut oil, but isn't all oily and slippery. I'm not even done with my first jar and seen significant results. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Oldenburger

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting a foot fungus for several years. Cracked heels cracked toes painful. Keeping it. At Bay kind of discovered this product thought I'd give it a try. The pain stopped almost immediately use it twice a day once in the morning after shower once in the evening after a Jacuzzi. And every day the feet look better and better. I use a foot smoother about once a week. I just ordered my second jar. And so far very very pleased. Hoping it continues I want to have pretty feet again.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Feels better after first use
customer_reviews.text: My heels are really dry and cracked. I opened as soon as I got and was glad I read that you dont need to put a lot on, that a little goes a long way. I noticed my heels felt better, immediately. It feels good just putting on. It warned if stinging potentially and even with my very cracked heels, no stinging just felt soothing. No scent at all..that I can smell. I put on and absorbs fast enough to go barefoot..maybe after 10 minutes. So far, really happy and can feel relief already. My feet hurt from dry cracks and I'm beyond happy with product. It delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for feet, hands, legs, elbows, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for any rough or dry areas on feet, hands, arms, elbows, knees, etc. It has a very different and distinctive texture that is hard to describe, but it is has a very pleasant feel, and rubs in without any effort. I use it before bed, and I can still feel the protective barrier when I wash my hands in the morning. It may work better if you use it at bedtime. Wash or soak your feet first, then pat dry, then apply the cream, then put on a pair of socks to sleep in. I would recommend this cream as it has worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Toms

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: I don;t really believe in miracles, but THIS PRODUCT is a MIRACLE WORKER. My heels were damaged, cracked, hard as nails. After just ONE application my heels are renewed. It's almost like someone took their heel off of their own foot and implanted it onto mine. I am on day 2 and almost every blemish in my heels is gone. I am using this with heel socks that have a gel/ silicone pad on the inside to help lock the moisture directly into my heels overnight. It is not necessary but I think it may help in the tiniest bit. I will be buying this product for everyone that I know at Christmas time. Thank goodness they sell 12 packs!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cruz

customer_reviews.title: THE Best EVER❣️❣️
customer_reviews.text: WOW...this is the BEST foot cream EVER❣️ I have tried several different foot creams this past northeast winter because my feet have been so much more dry & cracked than any winter I remember. After reading these reviews I decided to give it a try. NOW I’m SOLD❣️❣️ This will be what I buy from now on. After only 4 days my feet are so soft and smooth. I put in on after my shower and then keep my socks on all night. I only needed a small amount too...so it should last awhile. It’s better than the coconut oil I tried...plus it’s NOT greasy at all...and it’s odorless. I highly recommend it❣️
customer_reviews.author: winterfrost

customer_reviews.title: I finally found something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I opted to try this stuff! After just one use I felt a difference. Tonight I used it for the second time and my feet feel even better. I struggle with dry skin and I'm relieved that I FINALLY found something that works. I also use the cream on my dry hands. It has transformed my ugly, dry hands as well! I made the mistake of using way too much the first time around. You really don't need much! It goes on nice and smooth. You definitely won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I wear flip flops often and I surf so my feet get really dry especially my heals (see the first 2 before pictures). I want to make sure you know that the before shots were taken after using regular lotion on my feet for years. Obviously, the regular lotion was not doing the job. The after shots ( pictures 3 and 4) are after using 1 jar of Okeefe's Healthy Feet. What a difference especially considering that I was using regular lotion for years and my feet, as seen in the before pictures, look dry and cracked. I just bought a second jar of Okeefe's and will continue to use it as it has definitely done the job.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rea

customer_reviews.title: Magical foot cream that makes callous go bye-bye in a few days
customer_reviews.text: I must tell you: THIS IS THE BEST! I am a 1st grade teacher. I am on my feet all day. I have always had rough heels and callous since I was a teenager, when I got my first job as a cashier. For 25 years I have lived with callous- the only way to get rid of it for a few days was to get a pedi. Well NO MORE!!! I put this on twice a day, morning and night before I get in bed. I HAVE NO MORE CALLOUS PEOPLE!!! Buy this, buy this, buy this. I wish I took photos of before otherwise I’d post some before/after pics. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream! I have horribly dry cracked feet and hadn't been able to go get a pedicure. I bought a foot peel and this cream to use towards the end of the peeling process. This cream works amazing! I put it on every night after I get out of the shower before I go to bed. A little goes a long way. I do wash my hands after because the scent of this cream isn't great. It honestly smells a little like urine. But its going in my feet so really who cares lol
customer_reviews.author: Court Hummel

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I've bought numerous creams over the past 15-20 years and I rate this one as the best for my feet. I see the difference where it works on my cracked feet. It isn't the type that only works for a couple of hours. I see where it is making an improvement to my very dry skin. I have taken the advise of always blow drying my feet after a shower then applying this after. Not sure if it's the combination of both but wow...try it. It isn't enough to just dry feet with towel.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Great for cracked/painful heels
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very dry climate and my heels were so dry and cracked it started to become painful. I noticed a different immediately after 2 applications. So glad to have found something that works. This has become part of my daily regimen to keep my feet soft and moisturized. I apply twice a day, and at night I apply the O’Keeffe’s night foot mask on. I will never use another product ever again! Apply the cream then put socks on to lock in the moisture, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ~Summer~

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes but not enough for very dry, callouses and scaly feet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t soften as much as I’d like. I have very dry hard callouses plus flaky loose parts of my feet and this does moisturize my feet but doesn’t penetrate those really dry areas. Will search for maybe a thicker/richer foot cream.
customer_reviews.author: Alb

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help dry feet at all
customer_reviews.text: This product promises to heal severely dry feet healing. After using the entire amount my feet were no better than before. I put it on sometimes twice per day. I don’t think my feet were all that bad. I tried this as an alternate to Vaseline which has always been my usual remedy but it’s greasy and sometimes makes footprints even with socks on. O’Keeff’s Foot Cream is 2.5 times the cost of Vaseline and doesn’t work nearly as well. Live & learn I guess!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernDude

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My feet are not horrible like some of the pictures here but they’re always dry.I live in a dry climate and I’m in flip-flops a lot so that’s probably why. I do have some cracks in my feed but I get regular pedicure so they’re pretty OK. I have to say, this stuff works pretty good. Does keep your feet smooth but they still feel kind of dry. There are no cracks no dry skin I just would like my feet to feel a little more moisturized. Maybe it’s just me. But all in all I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not good for extremely dry cracked feet, This is good as a light moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a basic moisturizer for your feet but it doesn’t feel like A intense moisturizer for cracked feet . I’m 20 and my feet are nice, and all this does is lightly moisturize my feet. It doesn’t feel like something that would help intensely dry cracked feet if that is what you were suffering with.
customer_reviews.author: troytoria1

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great company overall
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I LOVE Working Hands. It's like friggin miracle cream. I remember when my son was born and got sick about a week after coming home. Well, I was washing my hands so frequently that they were cracking and bleeding all over the place. Working hands had me back to normal after ONE NIGHT of use before bed. That being said, their foot cream isn't quite as amazing, but still works very well. I use it before bed when my feet get really dry and wear socks during those nights. Usually has me back to normal after 2-3 nights of use.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Product is somewhat sticky
customer_reviews.text: I needed a moisturizer to help with the rough areas on my feet. O'Keefe's Foot Cream sounded like my best choice. I was little disappointed because it failed to soften the roughness on my heel's and the side of my big toes even after putting socks on after applying. I also did not like the fact that my hands were so sticky afterwards. I like your hand cream but this not as much.
customer_reviews.author: DMAL450

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS, IT IS RESONABLY PRICED. IT WAS WELL PACKED, ARRIVED ON TIME, APPRECIATE USING IT
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product over two months and have seen good results over time. I am an older person with dry skin on my hills and the bottom of my feet. At first it seems that the cream is sitting on top of your skin, but you will need to spend a few minutes each time to massaging it to your feet to get it all absorbed into the skin. The results is worth your time. You only need small amounts, so the jar will last you a long time. I do recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the rave reviews here, I am quite disappointed by this product. In the past, I've used Dr Scholl's foot cream which was super hydrating and worked really well. This cream has a balm-like greasy texture. I, too, have cracks on my heels and after using this product for almost 2 weeks now there hasn't been a great improvement. I've experienced much better results with the Dr Scholl's cream. I will most likely keep using this product since I bought it but really wish I just bought the cream I used before :\
customer_reviews.author: Daisy K

customer_reviews.title: Stay  Away from  buying!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DID Not work at all...Kerasul is a much Better Product and it work Great
customer_reviews.author: SUT

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for cracked heels! (And smelly feet)
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had taken before and after pics! This stuff is awesome! I was always embarrassed to wear sandals and flip flops or even go with friends for pedicure. My heels were terribly cracked, looked awful, and sometimes caused pain. I also Started having smelly feet. So I started using this cream. In the morning before putting on shoes and at night with socks in bed. That took some getting used to! But it helped! A lot! No longer embarrassed to wear sandals. My heels are not cracked. Even the smelly feet are gone!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Lily19780

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products claiming to relieve dry cracking skin on feet. None worked for me. A friend recommended O’Keefes. I looked at reviews figured what’s the harm in giving it a shot. 5stars for me...works great. Feet are healed and no cracking in over 6 months. And no I have not been at home during the Corona pandemic. I have been fortunate to work every week
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helped repair my feet. I had suddenly developed painful open cracks and needed something that would work quickly. The only thing I did not like was the way my feet felt rubbing against each other. I can't really explain the feeling with the cream does create an odd feeling so I just simply started using it when I was going to put on socks and then a pair of shoes and I quit using it when I was going to bed because the feeling kept me up lol! I don't like sleeping in socks and I do rub my feet against each other when I'm going to sleep lol!
customer_reviews.author: DM6

customer_reviews.title: A great skin balm that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using o'keeffe's hand Working Hands salve for years. I did not know that they also made a foot balm! It's wonderful! I found it accidentally while I was looking for some solution for my cracked heels. It's smooth and easy to apply. It is absolutely great! O'Keefe balm will now be a staple in my home! Thank you for this perfect product that totally does what it claims! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This foot cream did not work for me. I would describe my feet as normal and was just looking for a cream to make them a bit softer. I used the whole pack in about 6 weeks and used the cream every night. I did not notice a difference. What it does tho: the cream will leave marks on your bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magical Foot Balm
customer_reviews.text: I dont like leaving reviews TOO SOON on these types of products. HOWEVER, this stuff is the balm! (Har har) I had super itchy, dry, cracking feet 2 days ago and they are 95% healed after 2 applications! What?!? How?!? Magic! I paired this with some socks (specifically made for foot lotion) and BAM! My feet feel amazing! They have been keeping me up at night because they were so dry and itchy. If you are hesitant about buying this product...DONT BE! Just buy it. I literally cant wait to put it on again in the morning. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Abc

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This crap actually works! If you use it every day you WILL see change, I was amazed to see the difference it made in my partners feet, they went from sandpaper to now feeling silky and smooth. I really am AMAZED at what this creme did to his feet and I will be getting more to keep them that way!! 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cream and 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product that works as described. I had a big painful split in my heal that was bleeding and after only one day of use it had closed up and started healing and pain was gone. Both feet were soft and smooth after one day . It's so creamy and melts into your skin. My husbands haands get severely dry and cracked from his job so he tried it on his hands and they were 85% better by morning. Absolutely a miracle cream that I would recommend and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My feet started getting dry 10 years ago, after having children. They got worse and worse every year, I was using all kinds of lotions and pumices. My feet still looked awful and people would joking make comments about my feet. I was embarrassed and self conscious. I finally bought some of this cream, and my feet are like a babies. I am not longer embarrassed to wear shoes that show the back or sides of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have found for dry heels.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff is great! I live in sandals during the summer, and I have always had an issue with my heels being dry. I have tried many products with minimal results. With this product my heels and my entire foot felt and looked completely normal, moisturized. I also like that it does not take a lot of product, it absorbs quickly, and doesn't have much of a scent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MntMom

customer_reviews.title: I had my doubts but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used all sorts of products for my dry feet, but nothing works. I wear sandals all summer and my feet didn't look their best because they were so dry (especially around my big toe) One use and I really noticed a difference. If it is particularly dry, I put it on my feet and socks over it. It is not greasy as I had expected. It is a cream, that goes on nicely and soaks in quickly. I did not notice a greasy film or feeling on my feet. If your feet are very dry give it time to absorb into your feet, it takes time for the cream to work through particularly tough or thick skin.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious foot cream
customer_reviews.text: Never been one of those who has used foot cream as I did not fancy anything sticky and oily on my feet. This foot cream offers the lush moisture without the oily sticky feeling. Now I am a fan. I apply the cream before I go to sleep. I add a drop or two of Tea Tree essential oil or Lavender essential to the foot cream before application. Not sure of its healing properties as I am looking only for moisturizing effect which it definitely meets. The product was delivered on time and in good condition. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to write a review but this product deserves one. I have NEVER been more pleased with a purchase. I have suffered from extremely dry, cracked feet my whole life, sometimes to the point of bleeding painful heels. No amount of pedicures or foot creams have ever helped, despite my best efforts. 4 days. 4 DAYS of using this cream before bed has completely healed my feet. No more cracks, no more dryness —- perfectly healthy feet. Idk what’s in this stuff but it’s a miracle cream. BUY IT! Don’t think twice. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hassett

customer_reviews.title: Works to refresh rough feet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for feet in need! My feet were in rough shape from being pregnant in sandals all summer even a pedicure did nothing. I searched for a product and based on Amazon reviews purchased this. It is scentless and easily spreads and fixed my rough feet. They are back to normal. The only thing I’ll add is i still had to do some foot filing in the shower in combination with the lotion but my feet are now back to normal!
customer_reviews.author: Family of six

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a thyroid disease and one side effect is very dry feet. This stuff works very well. The positives? Well, it gets rid of the dead skin after a week of sleeping with it on (wear socks at night.). It doesn’t stink and it doesn’t make your feet feel slimy. The cons? A little doesn’t go a long way, so you go through the container fast. It is a bit pricey. I’ve only seen results with socks on overnight
customer_reviews.author: Run_Dealsrun

customer_reviews.title: The Solution to Dry, Cracked Feet
customer_reviews.text: So... I read about this on Buzzfeed and figured it was a sponsored post. But I had very badly cracked heels and decided to try it. I was AMAZED. I'll spare you the pictures of my feet, but suffice it to say, the cracks were gone after two applications and the callouses got a lot softer. Even if I forget to use it every night, my feet are still 100 times softer. Nice texture -- very firm, smooth cream -- and not much scent. Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: J. Manor

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I was literally at a loss and had no hope for repairing my cracked heels. I go barefoot all summer at home and they get worn out. At half a jar, using once a day, with socks, I started to see results. I'm not super consistent and after that I started using it a couple of times a week. At 3/4 of a jar, my heels are almost 100% healed. If I were better at doing it, I'm sure I would see results faster after the half jar mark.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I used the smallest amount of this product the first time and it was sticky. The label states it will be sticky if you use too much. I have used this for almost 1 week and no difference at all (my heels aren't even that bad and it doesn't work). I used it on my bf who's feet are horrible and it hasn't done anything for him either. I think this is a waste of money. Just stick to petroleum jelly and socks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany De Maria

customer_reviews.title: This product is a game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moses this stuff is amazing! I used to go all the time to get a pedi then realized I no longer wanted to do that anymore and take care of my feet on my own. I wear sandals ALL the time and my heels were cracking and gross looking. I did not think this product would work but boy was I amazed! One week just putting it on at night and then at the end of the week I used a foot grater on my feet and they have never been more smooth in my life. Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Unlike any other cream I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I applied this foot cream for the first time after using the Colossal Foot Rasp Foot File (because my heels were THAT bad). I’ve used the cream again each day after showering and I haven’t needed to use the foot file again, yet! The cream isn’t greasy like some others and it doesn’t have an awful and/or overbearing scent. My heels are so soft and the pain I had from the dryness and cracking is completely gone! I would absolutely recommend this product and I actually already have recommended it to both my mom and sister!
customer_reviews.author: CGK

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: One day I noticed that my heels were fairly calloused and cracked and so I bought this. I applied a ton and carefully put on socks before getting into bed for a few nights. When my skin felt soft, I scrubbed with a pumice stone in the shower and (gross but) so much skin came off. My feet are now super soft and smooth and I have about 2/3 of the product left. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Foot cream that works for cracked feet!!
customer_reviews.text: Less is more with this cream. I apply three times a week on clean feet, then pop on some socks and leave overnight. My huge cracks on the bottom of my feet are GONE. I just realized it today as I was massaging my feet. I didn't feel the giant crevices that were the Grand Canyon on either of my feet. I can't believe it. This stuff works wonders. Like I said, less is more otherwise you'll have sticky feet. I use maybe a penny-sized dollop and add a tiny bit extra if needed. Give this cream a chance, it really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: Where has this stuff been all my life???? I have dry cracked heels that are honestly embarrassing sometimes. It only started when I hit my late 30s but both my mother and grandmother always had this problem too. This stuff is like chapstick for your feet. Its great! Don't hesitate to buy it...you won't regret it. I've tried so many things and I finally came across something that works. I will spare any nasty feet pictures for before & after pics but the stuff WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Metro

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this product, I wasn’t sure it was going to work, even after reading all of the glowing reviews. It didn’t seem thick enough (I was expecting it to be Vaseline consistency) to make a difference. I was quickly proven wrong! I apply the cream in the mornings before work and after my shower every day. My feet have never been so soft! Not to mention, the price is super reasonable. I will be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my feet after one use.
customer_reviews.text: I had mild cracking and peeling from severe dry skin on my heels and big toes, so I applied the cream after exfoliating in the shower, and then I put socks on and went to bed. The sock helps to keep the moisture in! After the one use, my feet were no longer cracked or peeling or feeling dry. They were still slightly rough, but the improvement was HUGE. I will continue to use the lotion in this manner and im confident I will have baby soft feet after a few more uses.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M.

product_meta.title: O'Keeffe's Healthy Feet Foot Cream, 3.2 ounce Jar
product_meta.description: Size Name:1 - PackO'Keeffe's K0320001 for Healthy Feet Foot Cream, 3.2 oz, Jar.
feature_bullets: O’Keeffe’s for Healthy Feet Foot Cream is a concentrated foot cream that heals, relieves and repairs extremely dry, cracked feet
Creates a protective layer on the skin’s surface that instantly boosts moisture levels and helps prevent further moisture loss
O’Keeffe’s for Healthy Feet Foot Cream works fast; Most people start seeing improvements in their dry cracked feet in only a few days
Our Healthy Feet Foot Cream cream contains increased levels of Allantoin; The formula helps to penetrate thicker and rougher surface skin on the feet
Apply the foot cream to exfoliated skin at bedtime and after bathing, as these are the most effective times for moisturizing extremely dry feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars25,583 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
